mapper.insert: insert into TUSER(id, password, name) values(#{id}, #{password}, #{name})
mapper.update: update TUSER set password = #{password}, name = #{name}, picture = #{picture}, birth = #{birth}, last_login_date = #{lastLoginDate}, email_auth = #{emailAuth}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select last_login_date from TUSER where id = #{id}
